## Description {#details}

A helper class that handles instrumentation of VarArg functions on a particular platform.

Implementations are expected to insert the instrumentation necessary to propagate argument shadow through VarArg function calls. Visit&#42; methods are called during an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instvisitor">InstVisitor</a> pass over the function, and should avoid creating new basic blocks. A new instance of this class is created for each instrumented function.

Definition at line 1105 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/instrumentation/memorysanitizer-cpp">MemorySanitizer.cpp</a>.

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;MemorySanitizer.cpp&#125;::VarArgHelper::finalizeInstrumentation ()</>}>
Finalize function instrumentation.

This method is called after visiting all interesting (see above) instructions in a function.
